summary: This document is a Certificate of Authenticity from MoneyGram Payment Systems Inc., signed by Erin Stotts and notarized by Andrea J. Wentworth. It certifies that attached financial records were made in the regular course of business and are authentic, likely as part of a legal or investigative request for financial transaction data.

persons.name: Erin Stotts
persons.role: Law Enforcement Liaison at MoneyGram Payment Systems Inc.
persons.context: Declares the authenticity of attached financial records under penalty of perjury as part of their official duties at MoneyGram.

persons.name: Andrea J. Wentworth
persons.context: Notarized the sworn statement by Erin Stotts in Minnesota.

keyFacts: MoneyGram Payment Systems Inc. provided certified financial records, authenticated by a Law Enforcement Liaison.
The certification was made under penalty of perjury pursuant to 28 U.S.C. ยง 1746, indicating legal or investigative proceedings.
The document includes internal reference numbers (EFTA01265804, EFTA01265805, SONY_GM_00005437) suggesting it is part of a larger evidence set.
The notarization confirms the document's legitimacy for use in official matters.
